messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, I've been attacked by a man in the woods while I was hunting. Please send the police to my location immediately.
Where are you at?
I cannot stay on the phone. I have to cover him. Please send the police immediately.
Where are you? We need your location.
My name is Jeff McDonald. I'm on top of the hill out by banks. I was hunting and I was attacked by a man.
Do you know your exact location?
I don't know the exact coordinate. I hope you can get it from my 911 call. Here's my wife's number; she can bring you to me. Her name is Deborah.
Tell us what's happening right now.
I was attacked by a naked man. He's laying near me now. I'm holding my deer rifle on him. I need the police up here now.
Will your wife know where you are?
Yes, she will. Please call her and tell her I'm on top of the hill. I can't call her directly; I tried.
Okay, we will call her. Can you stay on the phone?
I may not be able to. I want to call my wife, but I'll stay for now. My battery is low.
We'll get some help out to you. Give me your wife's number.
Okay, her number is 5...
Where exactly are you again?
I'm about half a mile south of our house on a hill. I was attacked by a naked man. He's laying nearby, and I'm holding him at gunpoint.
Are you or the attacker injured?
Yes, both of us are injured, but it's not life-threatening.
Do you have anything to signal your location?
I don't want to fire my rifle. I can blow a whistle when they get close.
Start blowing the whistle now. Keep going until they find you.
Okay, I'll start blowing the whistle.
Are you on foot?
Yes, I'm on foot.
Does your wife know exactly where to guide them?
Yes, she does. She can guide them to me. They need to come through the logging gate.
Okay, we'll be there as soon as we can. Can you stay on the line?
I'll stay on unless my phone dies.
We'll get help to you. They will be on foot.
Okay, thank you.
Keep blowing the whistle every 20 seconds.
Okay, I will.
Do you see or hear anything?
Yes, they're here. I see them.
Great, stay with them and follow their instructions. Thank you and take care.
